mean_cn: adj. 重要的，精液的，种子的
mean_en: having a strong influence on ideas, works, events, etc., that come later :very important and influential
sentence: The Greek philosophers were seminal influences on modern Western thought.
sentence_trans: 希腊哲学家对现代西方思想有着重要的影响力。
word_etyma: semin精液的 + al形容词后缀 → seminal 精液的
